<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/message/send-media"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permite enviar imágenes, videos o audios a un número de WhatsApp.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Datos necesarios para enviar el archivo multimedia.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"media":{"type":"string","enum":["image","video","audio"],"example":"image","description":"Tipo de archivo multimedia."},"caption":{"type":"string","example":"Plain Text message","description":"Mensaje de texto acompañando el archivo."},"link":{"type":"string","example":"https://....","description":"URL o Base64 del archivo multimedia."},"number":{"type":"string","example":"51123456789","description":"Número de teléfono en formato internacional sin el \"+\"."}},"title":"EnviarMultimediaRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Multimedia enviado correctamente","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"key":{"type":"object","properties":{"remoteJid":{"type":"string","example":"51123456789@s.whatsapp.net"},"fromMe":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"id":{"type":"string","example":"3EB0CAF5AF1C92781BFD84"}}},"message":{"type":"object","properties":{"imageMessage":{"type":"object","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","example":"https://mmg.whatsapp.net/..."},"mimetype":{"type":"string","example":"image/png"},"caption":{"type":"string","example":"Plain Text message"},"fileSha256":{"type":"string","example":"ti3hY4w6Rx9QNRhaqBLENIrjB2cam5UzGCJZQRCU1Eo="},"fileLength":{"type":"integer","example":4397},"mediaKey":{"type":"string","example":"4WrvwBFE0olXpJOct8eQGKK0pcdgt9dHAinXy9nyCnE="},"fileEncSha256":{"type":"string","example":"1aNj9y6YoNDz4jblhGqRXDCxHGZBf4HCwPNL4wC8kkI="},"directPath":{"type":"string","example":"/o1/v/t62...."},"mediaKeyTimestamp":{"type":"string","example":"1731950781"},"contextInfo":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object"}}}}}},"messageTimestamp":{"type":"string","example":"1731950893"},"status":{"type":"string","example":"PENDING"}}}},"title":"SuccessResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Error en la solicitud","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"Descripción del error"}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"No autorizado (Token incorrecto o ausente)","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"Descripción del error"}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"500":{"description":"Error interno del servidor","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"Descripción del error"}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
